article: Two men are walking in the park . One is Mr Brown , a worker , the other is Mr Black . Mr Brown is going to a chair . It is beside the road . Mr Black is behind him . Mr Brown finds Mr Black . Now Mr Black begins to walk faster , because he wants to get to the chair before Mr Black . Now Mr Black begins to walk faster because he also wants to get to the chair first . Then they both run . Mr Black runs faster than Mr Brown . So he gets to the chair first and sits down on it . Mr Brown runs after Mr Black . When he gets to the chair , he sees Mr Black sitting on it . He is sorry to show a notice with the words " Wet Paint " to Mr Black . Now Mr Black knows why Mr Brown is going to the chair .
